DOC.detailed_description: The objective research assess effect increase protein fiber intake breakfast neural activation brain region associate appetitive drive reward-driven eating , measure subjective appetite , ingestive behavior overweight adult . Additional outcomes interest include effect breakfast intervention 24-hour glucose profile well fast postprandial glycemic lipemic regulation . The investigator test effect consume breakfast normal protein/normal fiber ( NPNF ) , normal protein/high fiber ( NPHF ) , high protein/normal fiber ( HPNF ) , high protein/high fiber ( HPHF ) two week randomize cross-over study .
